properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 9:18AM PST until January 8 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with possible gusts up to 35
kt and combined seas 7 to 10 feet possible when conditions are
worst.

* WHERE...Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente
Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa
Barbara Islands.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to
3 AM PST Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from late tonight
through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Potentially strong winds may create dangerous sea
conditions which could capsize or damage small and large
vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and combined
seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
